objective: The Scheme would be monitored and the entire flow of data and approval of proposals, etc. would take place on an online system.
benefits: Proposals for PIP sent by the States and their approval including any changes by MoFPI;
Proposal of PIP by national level training institutions of their approval including any changes;
Application for loans submitted by individual micro food processing enterprises;
Uploading of DPRs and details of handholding support provided;
Details of training support provided to individual Units;
Forwarding of loan proposals to the banks;
eligibility: Institute should have sufficient built-up space to undertake training for beneficiaries under the Scheme;
The institute preferably should have pilot plants for processing few products under ODOP for the State.
